name: Federal obligations for basic research in computer sciences and mathematics, by agency and detailed field: FY 2020
description: Federal obligations for basic research in computer sciences and mathematics, by agency and detailed field: FY 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. Only those agencies and subdivisions that had obligations in variables represented by this table appear in the table. FYs 2020 obligations include additional funding provided by supplemental COVID-19 related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act). See technical table A-2 for additional notes associated with the agencies listed in this table.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2020–21.
